channel.title: Hardware on Simple about ...
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Simple about ...

item.title: Huawei 2200 v3 default ip addresses and password
item.description: Today I tested new storage system: Huawei OceanStor 2200 V3. And I really liked this system. This is the third model of the data storage system of this manufacturer with which I happened to work. Some notes about default IP adresses of this system: The default IP addresses of the management network ports on controllers A and B are respectively 192.168.128.101 and 192.168.128.102, and the default subnet mask is 255.

item.title: Huawei OceanStor MIB
item.description: If you need MIB files for Huawei OceanStor go to Support > Bulletins > Service Bulletins > MIB Files > IT on Huawei site. Then download Unified Storage Device MIB Library.
